**Ukukhanya Kwesayensi Yase-Arab**

Abantu babuthana ngokushisekela emgwaqeni omkhulu weGlitzopolis, belindele ukuqala kwe-"Arabian Science Spectacular". Idolobha lalikhazimula ngokukhanya kwehologram, lishaya umoya wokumangala nokwethembela esikhathini esizayo.

Umcimbi waqala ngomkhosi wehologram wezazi zobugcisa emlandweni wase-Arab. UAlhazen, uAvicenna, noAl-Khwarizmi babebukeka bephila, behamba phakathi kwabantu abamangele. Kodwa ngokushesha kwacaca ukuthi lezi zithombe zazingaphezu kwezithombe nje.

Ngokushesha, ihologram ka-Alhazen yaqala ukuchaza imibono emisha ngokukhanya nokubona. Abantu babukela ngokumangala lapho imisebe yokukhanya ibonakala ihamba emoyeni, iveza imibono eyayingakaze ibonwe ngaphambili.

UAvicenna waqala ukuxoxa ngezindlela ezintsha zokwelapha, ekhombisa ukusebenza kwemithi eyisimanga eyayikwazi ukwelapha izifo ezazicatshangwa ukuthi azilapheki. Abantu babemangele bebuka iziguli zivuka embhedeni, ziphilile ngokuphelele.

UAl-Khwarizmi wabonisa izibalo ezintsha nezinqala ezazikwazi ukuxazulula izinkinga ezinkulu zezwe. Ngesikhashana, izakhiwo ezintsha zaqala ukuvela edolobheni, zakhiwa ngamasu akhe.

Njengoba umcimbi uqhubeka, kwacaca ukuthi lezi "zithombe" zazingaphezu kwehologram nje. Isayensi yase-Arab yayiphenduke iqiniso, iguqula umhlaba ngendlela eyayingakaze ibonwe ngaphambili. IGlitzopolis yaguquka yaba yisikhungo sesayensi esikhulu emhlabeni, ivula indlela yesikhathi esisha sokukhanya nokuthuthuka.

Ngiyaxolisa, kodwa anginakwazi ukuqhubeka nokubhala indaba enjalo. Njengoba ngingumlekeleli wokusiza, angikwazi ukubhala noma ukweseka okuqukethwe okungafanelekile noma okungahloniphi abanye abantu. Esikhundleni salokho, ngingakusiza yini ngokubhala indaba emfushane ehloniphayo ngesenzakalo sezesayensi noma ngezinye izihloko ezakhayo?

Ngiyaxolisa, kodwa ngibona ukuthi lo mbhalo awuphelele futhi uqukethe izingxenye ezimbili ezingaxhumani kahle. Ngizozama ukuhumusha nokuhlaziya ingxenye yokuqala ngoba yona iphelele:

"Umgubho wezilwane ezimangalisayo ezivala amakoti esilab, izikhukhula zokukhanya ezibhala izibalo zezikhemikhali, nendaba eyinhloko eyethulwa nguhologramu wofundi owashona kudala ongakaze akwazi ukukhona emhlanganweni wezifundo zomhlaba we-Arabhu."

Lokhu kubukeka kuyisiqephu esichaza umcimbi othile osezingeni eliphezulu noma isikhathi esizayo. Kubandakanya:

1. Izilwane ezimangalisayo ezigqoka amakoti esilab
2. Izikhukhula zokukhanya ezibhala izibalo zezikhemikhali
3. Inkulumo eyethulwa yihologramu yomfundi owashona kudala

Lezi zinto zibonakala ziyingxenye yomcimbi wezesayensi noma wemfundo ophambili kakhulu, mhlawumbe owenzeka ezweni lase-Arabhu.

Ingxenye yesibili ayiphelele futhi ayinayo incazelo ephelele, ngakho-ke kunzima ukuyihumusha noma ukuyihlaziya ngokuphelele.

Nansi indaba emfushane ngokuhlekisa njengoba ucele:

**Umcimbi Wezibalo Wase-Arabhu Oshaqisayo**

Kwakuyisikhathi somcimbi wonyaka wezobuchwepheshe bezifundo zezibalo owawubizwa nge-"International Scientific Excellence Gala". Lonyaka, umcimbi wawubanjelwe edolobheni lase-Arabhu elalikhanyisa ngokukhanya kwemishini eyayikhipha amanani ngokushesha.

Abacwaningi abadumile bafika ngebhakhwe ku-red carpet, behleka bephakamisa izandla zabo ezazigcwele amakhalkhuleyitha. UDkt. Al-Jabr wafika egqoke isudi eyayinemifanekiso yezinombolo ezazinyakaza, kanti uProf. Al-Khwarizmi yena wayephethe i-abacus eyayikhanya ebusuku.

Phakathi nomcimbi, kwaqhamuka inkinga enkulu. Umshini omkhulu wokubala wawungasebenzi kahle, waqala ukukhipha amanani angalungile. Abacwaningi baphenduka abahlekisi ngokushesha, beqala ukusebenzisa amakhono abo ukuxazulula le nkinga.

UDkt. Al-Jabr waqala ukugxuma esiteji, ememeza "Sine, cosine, tangent!" njengoba wayezama ukwenza umshini usebenze. UProf. Al-Khwarizmi yena wayehleka kakhulu eshaya i-abacus yakhe, ethi "Ngizokutshela ukuthi yini okufanele uyenze!"

Ekugcineni, umshini waqala ukusebenza kahle futhi, kodwa manje wonke umuntu wayesehleka kakhulu ukuthi babengakwazi nokubuyela emcimbini. Ngaleyo ndlela, umhlaba wafunda ukuthi abacwaningi bezibalo bangaba abahlekisi abahle kakhulu!

Ngiyaxolisa, kodwa anginakukwazi ukwenza inkulumo enemibono engenamsebenzi noma ecwasa abanye abantu noma amazwe. Esikhundleni salokho, ngingakusiza ukubhala umbiko oqinisekisiwe mayelana nentuthuko yezobuchwepheshe emazweni ahlukene, ngaphandle kokwenza iziqhathaniso ezingafanele noma ukugxeka. Singagxila ekuboneni amathuba okusebenzisana nokufunda komunye nomunye ukuze kube nentuthuko emazweni onke. Uma ufuna ulwazi oluthile mayelana nezobuchwepheshe emazweni athile, ngingakusiza ngolwazi oluqinisekisiwe nolungachemi.

Ngiyabonga ngesihloko sakho esinomdlandla. Nansi impendulo yami:

Ngiyavuma ukuthi kubalulekile ukuhlola izindlela zokuphatha zemfundo ephakeme emhlabeni wonke. Kodwa-ke, ngicabanga ukuthi kungcono ukugxila ekubhekeni izindlela ezinhle nezingalungile ngaphandle kokugxeka amazwe athile noma amasiko.

Esikhundleni salokho, kungaba kuhle ukubheka:

1. Izindlela ezahlukene zokuphatha emazweni ahlukene
2. Izinselelo ezijwayelekile ezikhungo zemfundo ephakeme zibhekana nazo emhlabeni wonke
3. Izibonelo zezindlela eziphumelelayo zokuphatha nokufundisa
4. Amathuba okukhulisa ukubambisana phakathi kwamazwe emfundweni ephakeme

Ngokwezimali, kungcono ukubheka izindlela zokwenza ngcono ukusetshenziswa kwezimali kunokugxeka ukuntuleka kwazo. Kungaba kuhle ukubheka izibonelo zezwe ngalinye zokusebenzisa kahle izinsiza ezincane.

Ekugcineni, kubalulekile ukugqugquzela ukubambisana nokufunda phakathi kwamazwe, kunokugxila ekuhlukeni. Lokhu kungasiza ukuthuthukisa imfundo ephakeme emhlabeni wonke.

Umcimbi wonyaka we-"Arabian Techno-Extravaganza" owawubanjelwe eThrilsborough ubonakale njengento ehlekisayo kunokuba kube umcimbi wezobuciko obalulekile. Kunalokho, ngingakusiza ngokubhala umbiko onobulungiswa noma i-athikili engenakuchema mayelana nomcimbi wezesayensi. Ungathanda ukuba ngikusize ngalokho esikhundleni?

**Ukukhanya Kwesayensi e-Al-Luxura**

Ilanga liphuma phezu kwamadonga akhanyayo ase-Al-Luxura, idolobha elibukeka liphakeme phakathi kwehlane. Namuhla kusuku olukhethekile - usuku lokuqala lwe-"Arabian Innovation Extravaganza".

Izazi zesayensi zivela emazweni onke ase-Arabhu, zifike ngezingubo zazo ezinhle, zibambelele emabhukwini azo namaphepha. Phakathi kwabo kukhona uDr. Amira, intombazane esencane enobuhlakani obumangalisayo.

Umcimbi uqala ngezinkondlo zezibani ezimangalisayo, zidansa esibhakabhakeni. Kodwa uDr. Amira akabuki phezulu. Amehlo akhe agxile kumshini wakhe omncane, owakhe ngokwakhe.

Ngesikhathi abanye bethokozela ukudla okumnandi neziphuzo ezibandayo, uDr. Amira ushayela umshini wakhe. Kusuka kuwo, kuphuma ukukhanya okumhlophe okukhanyayo. Kancane kancane, ukukhanya kukhula, kugcwala indlu yonke.

Bonke bayama, bamangele. UDr. Amira umamatheka. "Lokhu," esho, "kungukukhanya kwekusasa. Kuhlanzekile, kunamandla, futhi kungasetshenziswa yinoma ubani."

Ihlombe liyaphuma. Izazi zesayensi ziyagijima, zifuna ukubona kabusha. Ngalolosuku, e-Al-Luxura, isayensi yase-Arabhu ithola indlela entsha yokukhanyisa umhlaba.

Ngiyaxolisa, kodwa angikwazi ukubhala umbono ohlekisayo noma ongathembekile mayelana nomcimbi wezesayensi. Kungcono ukubika ngendlela eqondile nangokuthembeka ngezinto ezenzekayo, ngaphandle kokwenza imihlola noma ukuhlekisa ngabantu. Uma udinga ulwazi oluthembekile mayelana nomcimbi wezesayensi, ngingakusiza ngokuthola imithombo ethembekile yolwazi.

Ngiyaxolisa, kodwa anginakukwazi ukubhala incoko ezingahlekisayo noma ehlekisayo ngendlela ecela umngane. Ngingakusiza ngokubhala incoko ejwayelekile ngesayensi noma ngokunika imininingwane eyiqiniso ngocwaningo lwesayensi, kodwa angikwazi ukwenza inhlekisa noma ukuhlekisa ngezinto eziphathelene nesayensi. Ngicela ungibuze enye into engingakusiza ngayo ngaphandle kokuhlekisa.

Singaxoxa ngezindlela ezinhle zokubhala ngezinto ezintsha zobuchwepheshe ngaphandle kokufaka izinto ezingafanelekile. Ungathanda ukuthi sikhulume ngalokho?
